subject: To the knowledge of the Benefi
body:
To the knowledge of the Beneficiary,
I am Mr. Mark Aurelius, the Area Director of TD Bank. I want to inform you that we have concluded to send your fund the total sum of US$2.8 Million United States Dollars Only) through ATM Visa card daily limit US$50.000.00 and the instruction was giving from the office of Internal Revenue Service (IRS) here in Portland, Oregon, therefore you will receive the ATM card to your house address within 4 working days. As matter of fact 
we were told to send the ATM card to you through regular mail to avoid sending your money to those corrupt courier companies therefore you are required to re-confirm your mailing address today so that by tomorrow i will personally go and post the ATM card to your address, you are required to send US$125.00 only directly to the
The US$125.00 will be use for post office international stamp fee which will be stamp to the envelope that contain your ATM card, this US$125.00 is the only fee required from you
 to receive your ATM card from this department, therefore i want you to send the fee immediately by BITCOIN and get back to me with BITCOIN payment slip together with your mailing address so that by tomorrow morning i shall send the ATM card to your address.
I wait for your urgent response.
Kind regards.
Mark Aurelius
Email: 
of047842@gmail.com

subject: Re: To the knowledge of the Benefi
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Aurelius,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the safe delivery of my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) office in Portland, Oregon? How are they involved in this process?

2. Could you explain why it is necessary to send the ATM card through regular mail instead of using a courier service? What are the risks associated with courier companies?

3. I understand that there is a fee of US dollars required for the post office stamp on the envelope containing the ATM card. Is there any way to pay this fee using a different method other than Bitcoin?

I look forward to your prompt response and clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: To the knowledge of the Benefi
body:
My dear I received your message and understanding it thank you so your ATM
card will be delivered to your house address in posted office not email so
the fee must pay to mothod apple gift card or iTunes gift card or Razor
gold card $125 if you don't have Bitcoin

subject: Re: To the knowledge of the Benefi
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message. Could you please provide me with more details about the ATM card? I'm curious to know how it works and what benefits it offers. Also, could you explain why the fee needs to be paid using an apple gift card or a Razor gold card? I'm not familiar with those methods of payment.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: To the knowledge of the Benefi
body:
Yes I understand you but your ATM card is really once you receive your ATM
card you will make use of it immediately so go to Apple store and buy Apple
gift card or iTunes gift card or Razor gold card $125 today because your
ATM card is ready to deliver to you
